title: Patch 5.10 is Live - Got bugs, errors, let us know.

embed.description: Greetings Summoners! With every new patch Riot introduces to balance out champions and items there are some unforeseen issues that creep up and...

body:
Hello Everyone,

Patch 5.10 is live and we did encounter an issue with the release timing of Ekko. Unfortunately he was activated before the content was patched out, and for those players, you should have been refunded within the hour. Ekko is now released and available in the store.

I know that some of you will encounter issues with the new patch, it happens. Please check the reddit megathread here for most game bugs being reported (Our Dev team is actively tracking in this forum): http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/37jzvq/510_patch_bugs_megathread/

I hope you all have a great experience with the new patch, the changes, and the new champ Ekko. Please post here if you find yourself in need of some help though.

GL;HF
Riot Cochese

replies.body: We try to do this for every content patch.

I probably missed some because I'm not active on reddit. Maybe make this a constant sticky on the Help & Support boards? It would reduce the amount of discussions created concerning bugs in the most recent patch, as they'll most likely check this mega-thread first.
Does this happen for every patch or just the big ones?
